data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Gegharkunik.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gegharkunik, Armenia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Gegharkunik, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Gegharkunik, Armenia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Gegharkunik, Armenia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Nerkin Getashen
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Nerkin Getashen, Gegharkunik, Armenia.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Gegharkunik, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 21,580 believers in Gegharkunik against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gegharkunik, Armenia has a population of 235,100.

We estimate Gegharkunik has 21,580 people who might know Jesus, 195,800 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,721 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Gegharkunik, Armenia.
